languages.text:
Лог боя отображает подробную информацию о действиях персонажей и их результатах.
Здесь выводится информация о происходящем в бою: атаках, применении способностей и бросках проверок.

The combat log displays detailed information about characters' actions and their outcomes.
It is your primary tool for assessing combat-related data on attacks, abilities, and test rolls.
languages.original_text:
Лог боя отображает подробную информацию о действиях персонажей и их результатах.
Здесь выводится информация о происходящем в бою: атаках, применении способностей и бросках проверок.

traits.locale_text:

It is your primary tool for assessing combat-related data on attacks, abilities, and test rolls.

languages.text:
Das Kampflog zeigt detaillierte Informationen über die Aktionen von Charakteren und ihre Ergebnisse an.
Es ist ein elementares Werkzeug, um kampfbezogene Daten zu Angriffen, Fähigkeiten und Probenwürfe auszuwerten.
languages.original_text:
The combat log displays detailed information about characters' actions and their outcomes.
It is your primary tool for assessing combat-related data on attacks, abilities, and test rolls.

traits.locale_text:
Das Kampflog zeigt detaillierte Informationen über die Aktionen von Charakteren und ihre Ergebnisse an.
Es ist ein elementares Werkzeug, um kampfbezogene Daten zu Angriffen, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g}würfe auszuwerten.

languages.text:
Le journal de combat affiche des informations détaillées sur les actions des personnages et leurs conséquences.
Il s'agit de votre outil principal pour évaluer les données de combat relatives aux attaques, aux capacités et aux tests.
languages.original_text:
The combat log displays detailed information about characters' actions and their outcomes.
It is your primary tool for assessing combat-related data on attacks, abilities, and test rolls.

traits.locale_text:
Le journal de combat affiche des informations détaillées sur les actions des personnages et ce qu'il en résulte.
Il s'agit de votre outil principal pour évaluer les données de combat relatives aux attaques, aux {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et aux jets de dés liés aux {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

languages.text:
战斗日志会显示角色行动与结果的详细信息。
日志是您评估攻击、能力与检定掷骰等战术数据的主要工具。
languages.original_text:
The combat log displays detailed information about characters' actions and their outcomes.
It is your primary tool for assessing combat-related data on attacks, abilities, and test rolls.

traits.locale_text:
战斗日志会显示角色行动与结果的详细信息。
日志是您评估攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}掷骰等战术数据的主要工具。

languages.text:
El registro de combate muestra información detallada sobre las acciones de los personajes y sus resultados.
Se trata de tu herramienta principal para consultar datos de combate acerca de ataques, capacidades y tiradas de prueba.
languages.original_text:
The combat log displays detailed information about characters' actions and their outcomes.
It is your primary tool for assessing combat-related data on attacks, abilities, and test rolls.

traits.locale_text:
El registro de combate muestra información detallada sobre las acciones de los personajes y sus resultados.
Se trata de tu herramienta principal para consultar datos de combate acerca de ataques, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y tiradas de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g}.

languages.original_text:
The battle log displays detailed information about the character's actions and their results.
It displays information about what is happening in battle, such as attacks, abilities, and check rolls.

languages.text:
戦闘ログはキャラクターのアクションやその結果の詳細を示す。
攻撃、アビリティ、および判定ロールに役立つ戦闘関係のデータの主要ツールである。
languages.original_text:
The combat log displays detailed information about characters' actions and their outcomes.
It is your primary tool for assessing combat-related data on attacks, abilities, and test rolls.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘ログはキャラクターのアクションやその結果の詳細を示す。
攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}ロールに役立つ戦闘関係のデータの主要ツールである。

languages.text:
Çatışma kayıtları, karakterlerin eylemleri ve bu eylemlerin sonuçları hakkında ayrıntılı bilgiler sunar.
Saldırılar, kabiliyetler ve girilen testler gibi çatışmaya ilişkin verileri inceleyebilmeni sağlayan başlıca araçtır.
languages.original_text:
The combat log displays detailed information about characters' actions and their outcomes.
It is your primary tool for assessing combat-related data on attacks, abilities, and test rolls.
